hero.title: Transparent DJ Packages
hero.subtitle: Choose the package that perfectly fits your event. From intimate parties to large weddings - we have the right offer for every occasion. Including professional sound, atmospheric lighting and optional live saxophone.

allIn.title: All-inclusive packages
allIn.description: No hidden costs. All prices include arrival, setup, performance and breakdown.

liveSax.title: Live Saxophone option

guarantee.title: 100% Dance Guarantee
guarantee.description: Full dance floor or your money back. We've kept this promise in 500+ events.

faq.title: Answers for couples, event managers, and party hosts
faq.subtitle: Availability, tech coordination, and how we tailor the music and moments to your crowd.

items.question: How quickly do we get availability confirmation?
items.answer: Within one business hour on weekdays. If your date is hot, we include a backup DJ + sax option in the same reply.

items.question: Can you align with our venue or AV partner?
items.answer: Yes. We share our tech rider, handle load-in timing, and sync with venue/AV so your planner has one point of contact.

items.question: How do couples and planners shape the playlist?
items.answer: We run a 20-minute intake, capture must-play/do-not-play, ceremony moments, and keep a WhatsApp thread open until showtime.

items.question: Is live sax available for corporate or private parties?
items.answer: Yes‚Äîsax is available on all packages, and we can add percussion on request. Sets are synced to the DJ for tight transitions.

cta.title: Ready to make your party unforgettable?
cta.subtitle: Book now and receive a personal quote within 24 hours
cta.notSure: Not sure which package suits you? Contact us for personal advice!

highlights.title: Designed to keep the dance floor full
